data.title: Freshness does count!
data.text: When customers open the door and enter, they are greeted by the friendly employees.  I have found the employees to be patient, and really listen to the customers as they request the various sandwich items.  The employees wear disposable gloves, and it is apparent that cleanliness is a high priority.  We eat at Subway frequently, and have always been satisfied on each and every sandwich order.  Freshness and quality is important and this Subway does hit that high mark.
